Played this game for a little bit and I'd say that if you're new to these kinds of shooters and don't have a group of people to play with, don't buy this game until you've got someone that can generally run you through what you need to know and that you can consistently communicate with. 

Getting called an idiot for only playing for four hours while still learning and dealing with smurfing/de-rankers in your first competitive match(es) ain't a fun time, but if you get a good team going with good opponents close to your skill, it's a really good time.

Still, wouldn't recommend to everyone.

This game has graphics that stand well even in today's games (not great but good). The game mechanics make it a very easy to pick up but hard to master style and has a HUGE community making new maps and things to do with the work shop all the time as well as valve updating it at a nice pace as well. Over all it's a solid game that's tricky but fun and addictive. 9-10
Very fun and a time consumer for all who play. You meet many fun people with different styles and personalities from the comfort of your own space
Very good bit high learning curve but all around good game like the skins. 10/10
